name: Giant Earth Elemental
description: The Giant Earth Elemental embodies the raw power of the earth with a robust, large form, featuring a rocky exterior and a solid, imposing presence.
memorable: It can burrow through earth without a trace and grapple opponents effectively.
goals: Typically acts as a frontline defender or siege engine against fortifications.
relations: Related to other elemental creatures and may serve as a guardian or protector of earth-related locations.
environment: Found in underground areas, caves, or rocky terrains.
strengths: High durability, effective melee and ranged attacks, and unique burrowing ability.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to agile opponents.
attacks: Can perform strong melee slam attacks and a grappling embrace, as well as ranged rock throws.
most_powerful_ability: Earth Glide allows it to move through earth and stone stealthily and tactically.
senses: It has a passive Perception of 10, indicating limited sensory perception.
additional_information: Immunity to poison and several conditions.
Resistant to damage from nonmagical weapons.
Ability to deal double damage to objects with Siege Monster.
Does not require air, food, or sleep.
Can grapple and maintain advantage on attacks against grappled targets.
test_queries: massive earth creature with burrowing ability
powerful elemental that can grapple enemies
stone giant known for siege tactics
earth elemental with high durability in combat
defender creature that excels at melee attacks
